description:
Course Description

Learn the basic concepts,  functions that you will need to build fully functional programs with the popular framework, Laravel 5.2.

Content and Overview 

Suitable for beginners, through this course of 36 lectures and 5 hours of content, you’ll learn all of the basic of laravel .
Starting with the basic installation of Laravel , this course will take you through creating category for post, posts , image upload, login and email verification.
Students completing the course will have the knowledge to create  application in laravel 5.2

What am I going to get from this course?

  • Over 36 lectures and  5 hours of content!
  • Learn Laravel framework from a professional trainer from your own desk.
  • lectures  teaching you basic of laravel 5.2.
  • Suitable for beginner programmers and ideal for users who learn faster when shown.
title: Laravel for Beginners: Make Blog in Laravel 5.2
